Reveal the Stay:

Connect Directly with Hosts and Save! 🎉

StayReveal empowers you to book directly from hosts, bypassing high commission fees on platforms. Get better deals by revealing stays! 

Tired of paying extra when booking your favorite stay? StayReveal is a browser extension that reveals direct contact information for hosts, allowing you to book directly and save up to 30%!  Take control of your travel budget with StayReveal!

🔍 Step 1: Search for Your Favorite Stay 
Browse as you normally would, searching for the perfect stay on platforms like Booking.com.

🏡 Step 2: Reveal Direct Contact Information 
With one click, StayReveal reveals the host’s direct contact details, letting you bypass the middleman.

💸 Step 3: Book Directly and Save 
Contact the host directly to negotiate the best rate. By revealing stays, you could save up to 30% on booking fees.

StayReveal is 100% Free – Save Money with No Extra Cost! 
We believe in transparency and helping travelers save. That’s why StayReveal is completely free to use. No hidden fees, no subscriptions – just better deals when you reveal stays directly with hosts. 

🤩 Start Saving, Start Revealing! 🤩
